Package cn.nukkit.entity.custom

Class CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder

java.lang.Object
cn.nukkit.entity.custom.CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder
Enclosing class:
CustomEntityDefinition
public static final class CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder extends Object
Lightweight, immutable data definition. All gameplay knobs live in MetaStore below.

    • collisionBox

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder collisionBox(float width, float height)
      Sets the width and height of the Entity's collision box.
      Parameters:
      width - Float value, width of the collision box in blocks. A negative value will be assumed to be 0.
      height - Float value, height of the collision box in blocks. A negative value will be assumed to be 0.

    • followRange

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder followRange(int radius, int max)
      Defines the range, in blocks, that a mob will pursue a target.
      Parameters:
      radius - Int value, the radius of the area of blocks the entity will attempt to stay within around a target.
      max - Int value, the maximum distance the mob will go from a target.

    • knockbackResistance

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder knockbackResistance(float value)
      Compels an entity to resist being knocked backwards by a melee attack.
      Parameters:
      value - Float value, percentage of knockback resistance that an entity has. Valid values 0.0f -> 100.0f

    • typeFamily

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder typeFamily(String... families)
      Set family types of the entity, can be one or multiple strings
      Parameters:
      values - Set of strings ex: .typeFamily("type1", "type2", "type3")

    • maxAutoStep

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder maxAutoStep(float base, float controlled, float jumpPrevented)
      Entities with this component will have a maximum auto step height that is different depending

      on whether they are on a block that prevents jumping.

      Parameters:
      base - Float value, the maximum auto step height when on any other block.
      controlled - Float value, the maximum auto step height when on any other block and controlled by the player.
      jumpPrevented - Float value, the maximum auto step height when on a block that prevents jumping.

    • pushable

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder pushable(boolean isPushable, boolean isPushableByPiston)
      Defines what can push an entity between other entities and pistons.
      Parameters:
      isPushable - boolean value, whether the entity can be pushed by other entities.
      isPushableByPiston - boolean value, wehether the entity can be pushed by pistons safely.

    • physics

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder physics(boolean hasCollision, boolean hasGravity, boolean pushTowardsClosestSpace)
      Defines physics properties of an actor, including if it is affected by gravity or if it collides with objects.
      Parameters:
      hasCollision - boolean value, whether or not the object collides with things. (defaults to true)
      hasGravity - boolean value, whether or not the entity is affected by gravity. (defaults to true)
      pushTowardsClosestSpace - boolean value, whether or not the entity should be pushed towards the nearest open area when stuck inside a block. (defaults to true)

    • isPersistent

      public CustomEntityDefinition.SimpleBuilder isPersistent(boolean value)
      Set the default max health of the entity.
      Parameters:
      maxHealth - Int value
